entries.abort: Coward! I knew you didn't have it in you.
entries.arrived_at_loc: Maintain current position and wait for the arrival of the freighter.
entries.attack_notify: FF0000 Tactical Computer: pcontrast1 < Enemy fighters detected. > pcontrast1
entries.attack_stopped: FF0000 Tactical Computer: pcontrast1 < Enemy fighters eliminated. > pcontrast1
entries.complete: Excellently done. I would like to have a word with you. Come back and see me.
entries.failed_destroy: Destroyed! Perhaps I misjudged your abilities.
entries.failed_protect: You left the freighter's wing! Your job is to protect the vessel and that is what you are expected to do.
entries.found_loc: The freighter's arrival location has been sent to your navigation computer.
entries.goodbye_1: I can finish here. Next stop is Tatooine space. Thanks, pilot.
entries.goodbye_3: I will be safe from here on in.
entries.goodbye_4: I'll see you in Tatooine space.
entries.goodbye_5: I will be safe from here on in.
entries.hull_half: Hull at half strength. Get these villians off of us!
entries.panic_1: Black Suns in space. What's next?
entries.panic_2: Looks like we have some unwanted company.
entries.panic_4: Black Suns...this is why I always need someone like you.
entries.panic_5: Show them what you are made of.
entries.quest_escort_d: Follow and protect the freighter until it completes its journey across this system.
entries.quest_location_d: The freighter will meet you there.
entries.quest_rendezvous_d: Travel to the meeting location and wait for the arrival of the freighter.
entries.reason_1: Ok, it is time to get moving.
entries.reason_2: I have a delivery in this system and then it's on to Tatooine.
entries.reason_3: My cargo isn't going to deliver itself. Lets get moving.
entries.reason_4: I want to make this fast. We have a lot more systems to travel.
entries.shields_depleted: Shields down! We cannot last much longer.
entries.split_quest_alert: After we finish here, I have a delivery in Tatooine space.
entries.taunt_1: Surrender your cargo and perhaps we'll show mercy.
entries.taunt_3: I will show you no mercy.
entries.taunt_4: No one expects the Black Sun!
entries.thanks_1: Wow. You really taught those Black Suns a lesson.
entries.thanks_2: They are not so tough now.
entries.thanks_3: And they say you shouldn't stare at an exploding Black Sun.
entries.thanks_4: Impressive. You fly like a true ace.
entries.thanks_5: Those poor little Black Suns never knew what hit them.
entries.title: Corellia System: Escort the Freighter
entries.title_d: Nova Orion Industries have hired you to protect a freighter making its way across the galaxy.
